content:
Group Bookings

The Marker Waterfront Resort offers the ideal backdrop of social groups coming to play in Key West. With three pools on property, a poolside restaurant and bar and all of the fishing charters, snorkel boats and water activities located only steps outside, you will find fun waiting to be had when you arrive at our door. Perfect for bachelor and bachelorette parties, birthday celebrations, anniversary get-togethers and fishing groups, The Marker is only 3 blocks off world famous Duval Street where all of Key West’s best nightlife and restaurants are.

Contact the sales department today to find out the best group rate we can offer you for your stay in Key West.

Contact
